markdownRemark.html:
Journal of Environmental Psychology誌に論文"Strategy selection in a conflicting context during indoor wayfinding: Insights from direction and floor strategies."が掲載されました．

本文リンク：https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jenvp.2025.102711
